QuestData.Title: Ancient Power
QuestData.Description: Hozen skulls are prized tokens among my village.$B$BWe use them to perform ceremonial rites, and the older the skull, the more potent its magic.$B$BLuckily for us, the hozen are careless, filthy beasts. They leave the skulls of their dead scattered among their huts and campfires.$B$BCollect these skulls for me, and I will reward you handsomely.
QuestData.CompletionText: The skulls are precious to my tribe. How many have you collected?
QuestData.RewardText: It is good to see that you are so resourceful, $n. It is a trait admired by my people.$B$BThe fine specimens you have brought me will produce powerful magic.
